signature: String text(int, int, boolean, boolean, boolean)

enhanced_by.reason: The method text(int) sets a fixed length, which is a subset of the parameters used in the target method.
The method text(boolean) includes digits, which is a subset of the parameters used in the target method.
Both methods generate text strings, and the output of the target method can be validated against the configuration rules defined in TextRuleConfig.
The character() method generates a single character, which can be used to validate the inclusion of specific characters in the output of the target method.
